attributes.action: Have a General Election.  This is needed to stop this stalemate in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
This Parliament has divided the United Kingdom and act like spoiled juveniles in Parliament. Degrading the country which gave democracy to the world and embarrassing the people of the United Kingdom, making us a laughing stock with their childish antics. 
By signing my petition, you are not signing for or against anything other than a change of the MP’s who represent us.
attributes.background: This Parliament has demonstrated time and time again, it cannot Govern on behalf of the people. No matter, what your, political beliefs or how you voted, we need to bring this stalemate to an end and elect people that will be voting in to represent the people, they serve wishes and not their own.
